items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous!!!!
items.body: I can’t say enough good things about this dress!! I got a small and it fits perfectly. Very lady like and flattering. Fabric is thick enough not to show any bumps. It flows really well and it’s nice and warm suitable for cooler weather. Read more
items.author: CWA

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits well looks professional. Dressy or casual. Good winter piece.
items.author: deborah Hansen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and cute
items.body: Love this dress, I have it in two other colors. Very comfortable, true to color not see through like some sweater material be. Holds up very well through machine wash, does not lose its shape after drying. Compliments your covers in a modest way. The first 2 I ordered was a large and I’m 5’0 and at the time was around 170 and it was still cute. I ordered a medium with this one, weight is down some, 150-160 I’m top heavy and have a little bit of a mom belly with a little blessing on the bottom and this medium was a perfect fit. I definitely recommend this dress Read more
items.author: Shay

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Dress
items.body: The dress was as described and fit very well. I hoped the color would be deeper but is still very pretty. Read more
items.author: Kimberley Thompson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So pretty!
items.body: I ordered this dress for a wedding and it was so pretty! It is true to size, I ordered a size small and I am 5ft and 135lbs and it fit perfect, even in the length. This dress is flattering, the color is just as pictured and the material is comfortable and not see through. It isn’t too thick or too thin so it’s perfect for any season. The only reason I returned it was because I just simply found a different dress in a color that matched my husband for the wedding better. But I had no complaints! I definitely recommend this dress it is so versatile! Read more
items.author: Haley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good buy and fit
items.body: Better quality and fit than expected. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Dress
items.body: Comfortable dress perfect for fall/winter. I ordered two different colors and about to order another one! Read more
items.author: brian lee langley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pricey but Worth It
items.body: This is a great dress especially for the fall/winter time. It is a pretty thick material and it fits true to size. It is quite pricey, I am not sure the price is quite appropriate for this dress even though it is great. I would recommend it just know that it is a higher price range. Read more
items.author: BeeP

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Navy, Pink, Rust, Ivory, Apricot, Dark Blue, Black, Green, Pitaya. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
